strings.NEWT_PRAY_NORMAL: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Thank you so much, {2}! Please accept this gift: <style=cIsHealth>{3}</style></style>
strings.NEWT_PRAY_ELITE: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Much obliged, friend! {2}, take this — it might aid you: <style=cIsHealth>{3}</style></style>
strings.NEWT_PRAY_PECULIAR: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Divine blessings upon you, {2}. Here’s something unique: <style=cIsHealth>{3}</style></style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_1: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Really? That tickles more than it hurts.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_2: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Is that all? Hit harder, weakling.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_3: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Is that the best you’ve got? Pathetic.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_4: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Was that an attack or just an accident?</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_5: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Want to hear a joke? Look in the mirror.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_8: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: You’ll need more than that to get my attention.</style>
strings.NEWT_ATTACKED_WORD_9: <style=cWorldEvent>{0}{1}: Did you forget to bring your strength today?</style>
